attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please fire Richard Brunstrom, Cheif Constable of North Wales, he has stated ecstasy is safer than aspirin, this makes people more likely to break the law in relation to illegal drugs.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Fire Richard Brunstrom."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16608


Prime Minister's Office
